scripts.install: cd gateway; npm i; cd users; npm i; cd ../tasks; npm i; cd ../events; npm i;
scripts.test: cd users; npm run test; cd ../tasks; npm run test; cd ../events; npm run test;
scripts.coverage: cd users; npm run test-coverage; cd ../tasks; npm run test-coverage; cd ../events; npm run test-coverage;
scripts.migrate: cd users; npm run migrate; cd ../tasks; npm run migrate; cd ../events; npm run migrate;
scripts.seed: cd users; npm run db:seed:all; cd ../tasks; npm run db:seed:all; cd ../events; npm run db:seed:all;
